TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_innuite_a_tademaw, title = innuite_a_tademaw, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/innuite_a_tademaw} }

S.FORM: == kakiliman == uheni malecad tu intian a tademaw, nika mautang tu adidi' namakayni i paylen abayu katukuh i amilika, innite a tademaw u sapaadih mihida u mungku a tademaw u wayway nuheni mahini u takuliyaway a tademaw mapuletay. sapiadu yadah ku nuheni, nikaukuwang makutay nu aydaay, nika u pacing usapiedap sapibuting, innuite a tademaw mibuting ku kawaw, mibuting tu magulu u tikpay ku sa pibuting ayda macakat tu u baluhay hidan u sapiunduu sipisetset nu kanatal. u cayay kalecad nu sapibuting, caay kalecad ku buting,sapacemut, salil, pubu, pacing, innuteatademaw i nuamisan akitidaan u lalud apuyu' nika miyalatu mulangaway I bayu a lutuk, nikaukakanen nuheni u titi atu buting, mahiniay a nikaudip nuhekal, ucacangdayan nu heni amaudip u haypau atu Kanata nu ngabulu idawhenay maudip, ubanges nu aadupan mala innute a tademaw sadikucan tu kasienawan u kapahay a sapidihing tu sienaw. . Uluma' nuheni, nukakawsan sa u nukuli sisangaan a cenga tatihepahan misaluma' tu nusuleda a luma'.nika, u suleda hananay a pangangan caykaw wini aca nu suleda a cenga ku tuduan a luma', u cacana amasahicahicaay, miadih tu puut nikasumad; lalud, innuite a tademaw ubanges nu niadupan malabadahung nu nisadabek; kasienawan ilabu nu seleda a cenga a luma nuba'tu atu lala' a luma'. . nudikuda sa nikasumad nu demiad, i 14 asiki u cikiw micumud tu kasisuldaan, namueneng i kelulan nu tipan a subal uinnuite a tademaw atu muenengay i nuwalian nu awcu a tayluk ataniay malimad mihica hakiya masasu ada, inayay ku sakalepacaw "inadikuda a kitidaan inayay ku liwaliwan aca nu innuite a tademaw nu lalangawan a cacanan, mala nu awcu aca nukaudip a daduducen, umilihidaay tayni a bunacadan pahabay naming tu mapuletay a katalan, imahini, innuite a tademaw nitucekan a dadan kanahatu ayda tucek a kawaw sa "nikatadikud a lalangawan" maadih ku hekal kiyu hinisa tu maudip, sadikuday u maudipay nu dikudan tu.

== kakiliman == oheni malecad to intian a tademaw, nika maotang to adidi' namakayni i paylen abayo katokoh i amilika, innite a tademaw o sapaadih mihida o mongko a tademaw o wayway noheni mahini o takoliyaway a tademaw mapoletay. sapiado yadah ko noheni, nikaokowang makotay no aydaay, nika o pacing osapiedap sapiboting, innoite a tademaw miboting ko kawaw, miboting to magolo o tikpay ko sa piboting ayda macakat to o balohay hidan o sapiondoo sipisetset no kanatal. o cayay kalecad no sapiboting, caay kalecad ko boting,sapacemot, salil, pobo, pacing, innoteatademaw i noamisan akitidaan o lalod apoyo' nika miyalato molangaway I bayo a lotok, nikaokakanen noheni o titi ato boting, mahiniay a nikaodip nohekal, ocacangdayan no heni amaodip o haypao ato Kanata no ngabolo idawhenay maodip, obanges no aadopan mala innote a tademaw sadikocan to kasienawan o kapahay a sapidihing to sienaw. . Uloma' noheni, nokakawsan sa o nokoli sisangaan a cenga tatihepahan misaloma' to nosoleda a loma'.nika, o soleda hananay a pangangan caykaw wini aca no soleda a cenga ko todoan a loma', o cacana amasahicahicaay, miadih to poot nikasomad; lalod, innoite a tademaw obanges no niadopan malabadahong no nisadabek; kasienawan ilabo no seleda a cenga a loma noba'to ato lala' a loma'. . nodikoda sa nikasomad no demiad, i 14 asiki o cikiw micomod to kasisoldaan, namoeneng i kelolan no tipan a sobal oinnoite a tademaw ato moenengay i nowalian no awco a taylok ataniay malimad mihica hakiya masaso ada, inayay ko sakalepacaw "inadikoda a kitidaan inayay ko liwaliwan aca no innoite a tademaw no lalangawan a cacanan, mala no awco aca nokaodip a dadodocen, omilihidaay tayni a bonacadan pahabay naming to mapoletay a katalan, imahini, innoite a tademaw nitocekan a dadan kanahato ayda tocek a kawaw sa "nikatadikod a lalangawan" maadih ko hekal kiyo hinisa to maodip, sadikoday o maodipay no dikodan to.
